actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the relocation of a National Weather Service radar tower which is on Sulphur Mountain near Ojai, California.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to relocate the National Weather Service radar tower located on Sulphur Mountain near Ojai, California, to a new site which shall be selected so that the relocation: (1) will not result in degradation of service; and (2) will minimize the negative impacts of the radar tower and its emissions on residential areas. Mandates a report from the Secretary to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to require the relocation of a National Weather Service radar tower which is on Sulphur Mountain near Ojai, California.
